description: Ms. codex. Title supplied by cataloger. Physical description: 19-20 lines per page; written in small naskh in black on machine-made paper. Rubrication and catchwords; a few marginal notes. Mild staining. Origin: Text 2, 23 Dhū al-Qaʻdah 1300 H [25 September 1883], by Muḥammad Jaʻfar ibn ʻAbbās al-Gulpāygānī (leaf 257b). Text 1 copied by the same scribe, likely around the same time. 1. leaves 1b-74a: [Taqrīrāt fī uṣūl al-fiqh] / Muḥammad Jaʻfar ibn ʻAbbās al-Gulpāygānī. 2. leaves 76a-257b: [Badāʼiʻ al-afkār] / Ḥabīb Allāh ibn Muḥammad ʻAlī al-Rashtī.
extent: 257 leaves : paper ; 212 x 153 (142-150 x 80-92) mm bound to 215 x 156 mm
title: [Taqrīrāt fī uṣūl al-fiqh]. [Badāʼiʻ al-afkār].
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding note: Contemporary full red leather with blind-stamped fillets.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
